name: Pew Shoot
description:
Pew Shoot is a fast-action scrolling arcade shooter game!

Shoot colorful squares that fly at your ship to gain points and beat your friends!

Controls:

Click - lift ship! That's all!

The game automatically shoots for you.

Check it out on GitHub!

This game was originally a little fun 1.5 hour game competition between a friend and me. I fixed it up, and now it's a real game! Enjoy!
